data.title: Mabinogi World Wiki
data.meta_description: Mabinogi World Wiki is a dedicated English database of Mabinogi, an MMO developed by devCAT Studio and distributed by Nexon North America.
data.text:
Edit this section

March 7th, 2024

Nexon has announced that Mabinogi will be taken down for maintenance on March 7th at EST: 10:00am

UTC: 3:00pm

AEDT: 2:00am

7:00am PST100 until the estimated conclusion time at March 7th at EST: 1:30pm

UTC: 6:30pm

AEDT: 5:30am

10:30am PST100 for a total of 3 hours and 30 minutes. For more information, see here.

Milletian vs. Milletian Tournament. For more information, see here
